mapper.select: SELECT teachers_info.id as teacher_id, users_info.id as user_id, users_info.name as user_name, users_info.surname as user_surname, users_info.email as user_email, users_info.password as user_password, users_info.role as user_role, subjects.id as subject_id, subjects.name as subject_name FROM teachers_info LEFT JOIN users_info ON (teachers_info.user_id = users_info.id) LEFT JOIN teachers_subjects ON (teachers_info.id = teachers_subjects.teacher_id) LEFT JOIN subjects ON (teachers_subjects.subject_id = subjects.id)
